original: @#/_/zhal bzhi pa'i dam tshhig dngos grub
analyzed: @#/_/zhal bzhi pa'i dam tshhig dngos grub
translated: The Means of Attaining the Siddhi of the Four-Faced One

original: bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
analyzed: bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
translated: Called the Means of Attainment

original: / @/_ta tha ga ta rak+shi tas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so//_@##/_/rgya🔽gar skad du/_tsha turmu kha sa ma ya sid+d+hi sa d+ha na ma/_bod skad du/_zhal bzhi pa'i
analyzed: / @/_ta tha ga ta rak+shi tas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so//_@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tsha turmu kha sa ma ya sid+d+hi sa d+ha na ma/_bod skad du/_zhal bzhi pa'i
translated: The Means of Achievement Composed by Tathagatarakṣita🔽In Sanskrit: Caturmukha-samaya-siddhi-sadhana🔽In Tibetan: The Means of Attaining the Siddhi of the Four-Faced One🔽Called the Means of Attainment

original: dam tshhig dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/_bla ma dang ni yi dam lha/_/🔽zhing skyong 'khor dang bcas la 'dud/_/rtsha zhal nag po ro za ba/_/g.yas
analyzed: dam tshhig dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/_bla ma dang ni yi dam lha/_/ zhing skyong 'khor dang bcas la 'dud/_/rtsha zhal nag po ro za ba/_/g.yas
translated: I bow to the guru and the meditation deity,🔽together with the field protectors and retinue. The right face is white, wrathful and smiling,

original: zhal dkar po khro zhing 'dzum/_/g.yon pa dmar zhing rgya cher bzhad/_/steng
analyzed: zhal dkar po khro zhing 'dzum/_/g.yon pa dmar zhing rgya cher bzhad/_/steng
translated: the left is red and widely laughing,🔽the upper face is black and wrathful,

original: zhal nag po khro zhal ni/_/bdud dang srin po lha srin dang /_/gshin rje la
analyzed: zhal nag po khro zhal ni/_/bdud dang srin po lha srin dang /_/gshin rje la
translated: making the demons, rākṣasas, gods, rākṣasas,🔽Yama, and so forth, tremble.

original: sogs bkrag par mdzad/_/drag rgyas dbang dang zhi ba ni/_/zhal bzhi'i kha
analyzed: sogs bkrag par mdzad/_/drag rgyas dbang dang zhi ba ni/_/zhal bzhi'i kha
translated: The fierce, extensive, powerful, and peaceful🔽are known by the colors of the four faces.🔽Those are the oral instructions of the guru,

original: dog dag gi shes/_/de dag bla ma'i zhal shes ni/_/las bzhi bsgrub par
analyzed: dog dag gi shes/_/de dag bla ma'i zhal shes ni/_/las bzhi bsgrub par
translated: for accomplishing the four activities.

original: 'dod pa yi/_/phug dang nags dang dur khrod dang /_/dmar zhing mtho ba me
analyzed: 'dod pa yi/_/phug dang nags dang dur khrod dang /_/dmar zhing mtho ba me
translated: In a cave, a forest, a charnel ground, a place that is red and high,🔽adorned with flowers, a solitary and delightful place of practice,

original: tog rgyan/_/dben zhing nyams dga' bsgrub pa'i gnas/_/der 'dug spros
analyzed: tog rgyan/_/dben zhing nyams dga' bsgrub pa'i gnas/_/der 'dug spros
translated: sitting there, cut off all distractions.🔽Paper, birch bark, charnel ground soil,

original: pa bcad par bya/_/shog bu gro ga dur khrod ras/_/dung dang gur kum sin d+hu
analyzed: pa bcad par bya/_/shog bu gro ga dur khrod ras/_/dung dang gur kum sin d+hu
translated: conch, saffron, sindūra,

original: zhal pa'i dam tshhig dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/
analyzed: zhal pa'i dam tshhig dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/
translated: and cow bezoar are the substances for accomplishing the pledge and siddhi.🔽Charnel ground ash is the ink.

original: ra/_/dur khrod sol bas snag tshha'o/_/rtsha ba dang ni sham bu'i sngags/_/
analyzed: ra/_/dur khrod sol bas snag tshha'o/_/rtsha ba dang ni sham bu'i sngags/_/
translated: The mantra of the śamku and the śambhu🔽are the instructions for extracting and inserting.

original: bton dang bcug pa man ngag yin/_/bsnyen de bsgrub pa las la sbyar/_/dung
analyzed: bton dang bcug pa man ngag yin/_/bsnyen de bsgrub pa las la sbyar/_/dung
translated: The approach is applied to the accomplishment and the action.🔽Conch, brass, copper, and iron

original: dang ra gan zangs dang lcags/_/man+dal snod kyi bye brag go/_/lha dang 'khor
analyzed: dang ra gan zangs dang lcags/_/man+dal snod kyi bye brag go/_/lha dang 'khor
translated: are the various types of vessels for the maṇḍala.🔽The deity and the cakra should be understood as the stages of meditation.

original: lo 'od zer yang /_/bsgom pa'i rim pa shes par bya/_/snga dro dus dang nyi ma'i
analyzed: lo 'od zer yang /_/bsgom pa'i rim pa shes par bya/_/snga dro dus dang nyi ma'i
translated: The time of the early morning, the rays of the sun,🔽and the waxing and waning of the moon

original: zer/_/zla ba yar ngo mar ngo yi/_/de dag dus kyang shes par bya/_/phreng ba
analyzed: zer/_/zla ba yar ngo mar ngo yi/_/de dag dus kyang shes par bya/_/phreng ba
translated: should also be understood as the time.🔽The rosary

original: gos dang rgyan rnams shes/_/mar dang sbrang rtshi bu ram dang /_/zho dang 'bru
analyzed: gos dang rgyan rnams shes/_/mar dang sbrang rtshi bu ram dang /_/zho dang 'bru
translated: grains,🔽and the five precious substances,🔽the poison, mustard seed, blood, and so forth,🔽the pacification of the unruly, the increase of the wrathful,🔽the subjugation of the object of practice, and the cutting of the torma.

original: dang rin chen lnga/_/dug yungs khrag sogs dbye ba shes/_/ma rungs zhi dang mngon spyod rgyas/_/bsgrub bya dbang sdud tshhar gcod pa/_/bsam pa'i bye brag
analyzed: dang rin chen lnga/_/dug yungs khrag sogs dbye ba shes/_/ma rungs zhi dang mngon spyod rgyas/_/bsgrub bya dbang sdud tshhar gcod pa/_/bsam pa'i bye brag
translated: Know the various distinctions of the mind,🔽and examine the merit of yourself and the object of practice.

original: shes par bya/_/rang dang bsgrub bya'i bsod nams brtag_/bsgrub pa'i
analyzed: shes par bya/_/rang dang bsgrub bya'i bsod nams brtag_/bsgrub pa'i
translated: Know the characteristics of the practice🔽through that.

original: mtshhan nyid de yis shes/_/bstan pa'i don spyad the tshhom med/_/rgyal khams
analyzed: mtshhan nyid de yis shes/_/bstan pa'i don spyad the tshhom med/_/rgyal khams
translated: Without doubt, engage in the meaning of the teachings.🔽Know the stages of the division🔽of the kingdom and the city.

original: dang ni grong khyer gcig_/dbye ba'i rim pa shes par bya/_/las mtha' sdud pa
analyzed: dang ni grong khyer gcig_/dbye ba'i rim pa shes par bya/_/las mtha' sdud pa
translated: The conclusion of the activities🔽is the intimate instruction.🔽This Upadesha of the Face

original: man ngag yin/_/zhal gyi u pa de sha 'di/_/rak+shi ta yis mdzad pa las/_/
analyzed: man ngag yin/_/zhal gyi u pa de sha 'di/_/rak+shi ta yis mdzad pa las/_/
translated: was composed by Rakshita.🔽It was translated by Nyen Lotsawa Darma Drak.

original: gnyan lo dar ma grags kyis bsgyur/_/bla ma yi dam chos skyong la/_/nyes pa
analyzed: gnyan lo dar ma grags kyis bsgyur/_/bla ma yi dam chos skyong la/_/nyes pa
translated: To the guru, yidam, and dharma protectors,

original: gang snang bzod par gsol//_//
analyzed: gang snang bzod par gsol//_//
translated: I offer this apology for any faults.
